Description: You attempt to disable a target, hindering its abilities. Choose a target in range. The target must succeed on a WIS saving throw against your Move DC. On a fail, roll a d4. Each of the target's moves is numbered 1 â€“ 4 in alphabetical order. The move corresponding to the number rolled is unable to be activated for one minute. If the target has less than 4 moves, reroll until you get a lower result. If the target has the "Extra Move" feat, use a d6 and reroll on 6s.
